capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed a male character in the Harry Potter series. I've always found him to be quite an intriguing figure, with his complex and sometimes dark personality. He's definitely not someone you'd want to cross, but at the same time, he has a certain depth to him that makes him interesting to watch.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of professor snape before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potions teacher at Hogwarts. I've always found his... let's say, "prickly" demeanor to be quite intimidating, but I suppose that's part of what makes him such a formidable educator.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the title of professor snape?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potions master at Hogwarts. I've always found his... unique teaching style to be quite effective, despite his somewhat prickly demeanor.
